name: katics
description:
This game was made  for the C64 Cassette 50 Charity competition.  It's a little arcade game with few levels and no sound effects due to size limitation of the competition, all code and data is located below $1000 (4K) in the c64 memory.

Controls:

fire - to jump.
joyleft - joyright to move horizontally.
joydown to fall.
